```{r Library Setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
library(rnoaa)
library(janitor)
```
```{r Read and Clean Data, warning = FALSE}
set.seed(12345)
data("instacart")
## Boxplot
instacart %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  group_by(order_dow, order_hour_of_day) %>%
  summarize(n = n()) %>%
##  mutate(aisle_id = forcats::fct_reorder(as.factor(aisle_id), n)) 
plot_ly(x = ~order_dow, y = ~order_hour_of_day, type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
          alpha = 0.5,
          color = ~order_dow)
```

```{r}
## Bargraph of Number of Items Ordered per Department
x <- list(title = "Department")
y <- list(title = "Amount of Items Ordered")
instacart %>%
  count(department) %>% 
  mutate(department = fct_reorder(department, n)) %>% 
  rename(amount = n) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~department, y = ~amount, color = ~department, type = "bar") %>%
  layout(xaxis = x, yaxis = y)
```
